data.comment: The match is underway at Nippert Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cincinnati.
In the minute 2, Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
Throw-in Minnesota.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Minnesota close to the penalty box.
Can Cincinnati capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Minnesota's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Malik Badawi awards Minnesota a goal kick.
Malik Badawi signals a Cincinnati throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Siem de Jong (Cincinnati) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Minnesota at Nippert Stadium.
Goal kick for Minnesota at Nippert Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
In the minute 16, Siem de Jong (Cincinnati) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Cincinnati are in shooting range from this free kick.
Cincinnati push forward at Nippert Stadium and Siem de Jong gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Minnesota defence.
In the minute 18, Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Malik Badawi.
In Cincinnati Cincinnati attack through Tom Pettersson. The finish is off target, however.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the away team in Cincinnati.
Free kick for Cincinnati in the half of Minnesota.
Cincinnati advance rapidly upfield but Malik Badawi blows for offside.
In the minute 24, Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Cincinnati.
Malik Badawi signals a free kick to Minnesota.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Minnesota are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Cincinnati is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Minnesota at Nippert Stadium.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 30, Cincinnati push upfield but Malik Badawi quickly pulls them for offside.
Alvaro Barreal of Cincinnati gets in a strike, but is off target.
Malik Badawi awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Cincinnati's Siem de Jong misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Minnesota at Nippert Stadium.
Malik Badawi awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
Malik Badawi signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Minnesota are pushing forward but Ethan Finlay's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
Kevin Molino gets his shot on target but fails to score for Minnesota.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Malik Badawi signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Cincinnati's Alvaro Barreal breaks free at Nippert Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Cincinnati are coming forward and Siem de Jong gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cincinnati.
Free kick Minnesota.
In the minute 41, Malik Badawi signals a throw-in for Minnesota, close to Cincinnati's area.
Can Cincinnati get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Minnesota's Jan Gregus gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cincinnati defender.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
Corner awarded to Minnesota.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Nippert Stadium.
The second-half is underway at Nippert Stadium.
Free kick in a good position for Minnesota!
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Cincinnati.
Minnesota pushes forward through Robin Lod, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 49, Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Cincinnati get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
In Cincinnati a free kick has been awarded the home team.

Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Cincinnati.
Free kick Minnesota.

Michael Boxall for Minnesota gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
In the minute 57, Jan Gregus (Minnesota) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Malik Badawi.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.

Cincinnati drive upfield and Tom Pettersson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Minnesota defender.

Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.

Minnesota make their first substitution with Aaron Schoenfeld replacing Kei Kamara.

In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
In Cincinnati Minnesota attack through Emanuel Reynoso. The finish is off target, however.

Free kick Minnesota.

Chase Gasper (Minnesota) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Malik Badawi.

Minnesota to take a throw-in in Cincinnati territory.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
Rashawn Dally is replacing Frankie Amaya for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
Goal! Aaron Schoenfeld gives Minnesota a 0-1 lead.
Adrian Heath (Minnesota) is making a third substitution, with Brent Kallman replacing Kevin Molino.
